actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend section 103(e)(4) of title 23, United States Code, to extend the deadline for withdrawal of approval of the Westway project in New York and for approval of highway and transit projects substituted for such project until December 30, 1985.

summary.text: Extends from September 30, 1985, to December 30, 1985, the deadline by which the Secretary of Transportation may approve route withdrawals and substitute mass transit projects with respect to routes which on May 12, 1982, were under judicial injunction prohibiting their construction (the Westway project in New York).

titles.title: A bill to amend section 103(e)(4) of title 23, United States Code, to extend the deadline for withdrawal of approval of the Westway project in New York and for approval of highway and transit projects substituted for such project until December 30, 1985.
